Ellen Thomas (a mụrụ na Jenụwarị 24, afọ 1947) bụ onye America na-ahụ maka udo
O bu ụzọ tinye aka na White House Peace Vigil na Eprel 13, afọ 1984
Nwa nwanyị nke onye agha mmiri US, a mụrụ Thomas na Brooklyn ma too na California
Ọ malitere imegide ngwá agha nuklia n'oge ọ bụ nwata. N'ime mkpesa megide iwu gọọmentị United States, ọ ghọrọ onye na-eguzogide ụtụ isi site n'ibi ndụ n'okpuru ọnụ ọgụgụ ụtụ isi.
Na Mee 6, 1984, Ellen Benjamin lụrụ Thomas na agbamakwụkwọ Quaker ka ọ bụrụ Ellen Thomas. Thomas na di ya mere ngagharị iwe ọnụ ruo ọtụtụ afọ, ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na Jenụwarị afọ 2009 n'ọrịa akpa ume.
Ellen na-edukwa The Proposition One Non-Radioactive Nuclear Review, otu ndị na-eme njem multimedia nke na-akụziri ọha na eze ihe ize ndụ nke ọdịnihu nuklia
N'afọ 1993, o nyere aka n'ịhazi atụmatụ ntuli aka nke Washington DC maka Nuclear Disarmament na Economic Conversion
Ellen jere ozi na bọọdụ ndị nduzi nke Washington Peace Center, mana kemgbe ahụ ọ kwagara North Carolina.
The Oracles of Pennsylvania Avenue (2012) nke Tim Wilkerson, ihe ngosi nke Al Jazeera Documentary Channel nyere iwu, na-akọ akụkọ ndụ William na Ellen Thomas, Concepción Picciotto na Norman Mayer.
